snippet.title: Smack Studio Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Back us on Kickstarter: https://smackstudio.com/kickstarter
Join our Discord: https://smackstudio.com/discord
We've officially launched a Kickstarter campaign! It ends on February 28th, so act now to get backer-exclusive perks like an early access Steam key, exclusive digital and physical merch, exclusive shiny skin for use online, and a chance to work with the dev team to add your own stage and character to the game.

Get info on our Stretch Goals progress, FAQs, and other exciting happenings: https://smackstudio.com/kickstarter

Newcomers Dagen and Tate join the roster! Community rockstar Brett Ruys (aka Lunchbillion) created Dagen way back during our alpha launch back in September  - and the character's made its way into the official roster! 

Dagen is a dagger-wielding vampire. He can transform into a bat to assist in recovery, and his foes quake at his terrifying bite.

Tate is an athletic armadillo who loves to move. His claws allow him to dig underground, and his ball form cranks up his speed. 

Editing by David V. Kimball.
Voice over by Nick Papoutsakis. VO mastering by EssieLessie.

Opening fighting game scene footage: 

Street Fighter (1987) by Capcom / Hudson Soft
Fatal Furty 2 (1992) by SNK
Mortal Kombat (1992) by Midway Games
Virtua Fighter (1993) by SEGA
Super Smash Bros. (1999) by Nintendo / HAL Laboratory

Character credits: 

Granite, Cora, and Kaien were designed by Alec Dutch and Daniel Reis.
Spry design and moveset was created by Chaoko.
Tate was designed by Alec Dutch and Daniel Reis, moveset by Brett Ruys / Lunchbillion.
Dagen and Bernard were created by Brett Ruys / Lunchbillion. Leonard and Te Piha are featured in-game as their own likenesses - their movesets were created by Brett Ruys / Lunchbillion.
Rin was created by David V. Kimball. 
Captain Antpez was created by Anthony Lopez, and was made during the PAX West 2021 play event.
Exquisite Corps was an unholy effort by the Smack Studio community, to combine completely separate sprite parts into one abhorant monstrosity. It was created by: P0kéPanda, EssieLessie, TotiB, Isaiah, RiCK, Brett Ruys / Lunchbillion, Beans, AcroPR, JozziBoi, Play Dash, CaptainTechnicality, and Edrobot.

Third party / outside guest appearances:

Reroll from Rereolling Knights: game created by Robbie Wakefield and Daimen Paquin-Nault, Reroll Smack Studio character moveset created by Tauvalian
Swole Doge sprite design created by Haykira: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L42ndd0a7Qs - moveset created by David V. Kimball and EssieLessie.
Sarah, Xeon, Fighting Robot, The Awesome Possum, and Mikos the Panda were created by Stephen Challener (aka Redshrike) via OpenGameArt.org: https://opengameart.org/users/redshrike and are also featured in Ultimate Smash Friends: https://github.com/tshirtman/ultimate-smash-friends
"Skrill" and "Wormwood" come from a pack of RPG Enemies created by Stephen Challener (aka Redshrike), and can be found here: https://opengameart.org/content/more-rpg-enemies

Music credits:

Song: Vitalii Suzdin - Beyond the Mind (No Copyright Music)
Music provided by Tunetank.
Free Download:  https://bit.ly/3c7BIOd​
Video Link: https://youtu.be/CxMq1_se3g8

Opening music provided by Argofox

Video clip credits: 

Opening fighting game Montage: 

Street Fighter: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kVLCv-YgWco
Fatal Fury 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HbWPpkTN4tY
Mortal Kombat: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7F82XAvCuVc
Virtua Fighter: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oLKfzKzS_RY
Super Smash Bros.: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cfHndlMwL-Y

Controller montage: 
GameCube Controller: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uD5889hhaeQ
B0XX Controller: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=75Nu5LzgVB4
Steam Controller: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1nJ-QkPO8M
Hitbox Arcade Controller: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FmLddqPSTyg
Nintendo Switch Pro controller: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pK-jnfYU2kw
Xbox One Controller: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=386xBbbmf98
DualShock 4 Controller: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RG_eDDXWFm4
PlayStation 5 DualSense Controller: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PkGmh4Yy2gU
Xbox 360 Controller: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OlcDMwmbA6c
Brawler 64 Wireless Contoller: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2u7MhLlT5S0

Others:
Lightning and mist Stock Video by Videezy: https://www.videezy.com/
